sentences.sentence: The commando blackened his face with charcoal.
sentences.translation: 那名突击队员用木炭把他的脸涂黑。

sentences.sentence: Of course, the Israeli commando action played out in full view of the world.
sentences.translation: 当然，以色列士兵的行为处于全球 众目睽睽之下。
